name: PEM_XS_BAT_PERF_STAT_CPU_1_EVENT_ANY_P01
summary: Verify CPU1 PEM to check any performance event excursion occurs due to P01(one core turbo) drop during 60 seconds CPU stress running, perf command: perf stat -C 1 -e pnp_excursion_monitor/any,frequency_threshold=$P0_mhz,duration=10/,duration=10/ sleep 60
